Adjustable volume

For systems that present auditory content, people may need to adjust the volume of the system to a suitable level.

Notes

Note: This could apply to all people using audio autoput where the listening environment is noisy.

Note: This could apply to the main audio channel or could apply to individual apps, media, and other audio channels.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
AuditoryTime-based contentAdjust

  • Reference: 5-2-5-a to adjust the volume to a suitable level
